mostRead.title: Whoever recites the 'verse of the Throne' after every prescribed prayer, there will be nothing standing between him and entry into Paradise but his death.
If anyone recited two verses from the last of Surah al-Baqarah at night, they will be sufficient for him.
Whoever memorizes ten verses from the beginning of Surat al-Kahf will be immune to the False Messiah.
Everything has a heart, and the heart of the Quran is Yaseen; whoever reads it, it is as if he has read the Quran ten times.
Everything has an adornment, and the adornment of Quran is Surah Ar Rahman.
Whoever recites Surah al-Waqiah every night, he will never be afflicted by poverty.
Whoever reads Surah al-Mulk every night, Allah will protect him from the torment of the grave.
